text: Bernadett Horváth (born 10 May 1990 in Kapuvár) is a Hungarian handballer who plays for Mosonmagyaróvári KC SE as a line player. She has been capped 27 times for the Hungarian junior national team, in which she has scored 55 goals. ==Achievements== *Nemzeti Bajnokság I: **Winner: 2008, 2009 *Nemzeti Bajnokság I/B: **Winner: 2018 * Magyar Kupa: **Winner: 2008, 2009 **Bronze Medallist: 2011 *EHF Champions League: **Finalist: 2009 **Semifinalist: 2008 *Junior European Championship: **Silver Medallist: 2009 ==References== ==External links== * Bernadett Horváth career statistics at Worldhandball Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kapuvár Category:Hungarian female handball players Category:Győri Audi ETO KC players Category:Fehérvár KC players
title: Bernadett Horváth
